qrCodes.heading: QR-Codes (for the Digital Service Assistant App)
qrCodes.noDrivesSelected: Please select drives in the table to generate QR codes.
qrCodes.noDrivesConnected: Currently no QR codes are generated, because no drives are detected.

contactTable.export.text: Export the table below and send per mail to

messages.success: No drive or motor reports an increased failure probability
messages.warning: One or more drives or motors report an increased failure probability. Please contact your Bosch Rexroth service.
messages.error: One or more drives or motors report a strongly increased failure probability. Please contact your Bosch Rexroth service.

bannerMessages.serviceMode: Attention! The Service Mode is currently active, therefore a connection to drives is not possible.
bannerMessages.DCAUninstalled: Attention! The Drive Connect App is currently not installed. Please go to the Apps manager, install the app and try again.
bannerMessages.DCAInactive: Attention! The Drive Connect App is currently not activated. Please go to the Apps manager, activate the app and try again.
bannerMessages.notAuthorized: Attention! You are not authorized to use this application. Please go to the User management and apply the permission.
bannerMessages.noDrivesFound: Warning! Service Indicator cannot detect any drives. Please make sure that the drives are correctly attached and reachable.

commandBar.axesLimitExceededTooltip: The current licence supports monitoring a maximum of 50 axes.

export.headline: Export axes to Excel
export.descriptionHistogram: Include histogram values in the export

addDevice.headline: Add Remote Devices
addDevice.errorInvalidIPMax: Maximum IP address has invalid format
addDevice.errorTooManyAxes: The maximum number of axes supported by this license is 50. It is not possible to add more axes.
addDevice.toastSuccessfullyAdded: Request executed successfully. The table will be updated shortly.

removeDevice.headline: Remove Remote Devices
removeDevice.toastSuccessfullyAdded: Request executed successfully. The table will be updated shortly.
